Requirements for Releasing Withheld Funds and Resuming Discontinued Awards
Release withheld funds or resume a discontinued award if
the country in which the beneficiary resides is removed from the list referenced in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 3.B.1.a
the beneficiary establishes residence in a country that is
not
on the referenced list, or
the beneficiary has requested award payments be mailed to him/her in care of a U.S. Foreign Service post in a country that is
not
on the referenced list.

.
